item.title: BE the NO 1 on YOUR CUSTOMERS MIND in 5 WAYS
CONTENT CURATORS. YOU WANT TO BUY BENZ? THEN YOU NEED THESE TOOLS
item.description: These content tools are here to stay, it would definitely make your work easy and very professional, so you need to keep them handy… ANIMAKER You nerd a studio created animated video without outrageous price tag? Then, you need ANIMAKER. You can create multiple video types including explainer videos, white board videos and even infographic videos. All you need to do is to sign up, and viola! Lots of templates to work with and you can create yours too!
